overview: 42 years old A-Min is a quiet and reserved man. He is a delivery worker in a fish market in Tainan. He is secretly gay and has never been out of the closet. His wife, Xiaohui who was young and already pregnant when they met. She took off after giving birth to her daughter Xiaofeng. A-min and Xiaofeng had been each other’s only family ever since, until one day, when A-Min finds Xiao-feng missing...
title: The Road Home
